channel.title: Etl on Systology
channel.description: Recent content in Etl on Systology

item.title: Data Pipelines
item.description: Principles for reliable batch and streaming pipelines: time semantics, fault tolerance, partitioning, observability, and reproducibility.

item.title: ETL Pipeline for ML Features
item.description: Robust ETL pipeline for deterministic, reproducible ML feature generation from diverse sources, with idempotence and scale in mind.

item.title: Spark Trial
item.description: End-to-end ETL example using Apache Spark for parquet datasets; focuses on schema handling, partitioning, and reproducible aggregation.
